title: Trump, Vance portraits released ahead of inauguration: See photos
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump and Vice President-elect JD Vance release official headshots a few days before inauguration festivities kick off.

title: No, estos legisladores de Dinamarca no se ríen de Trump | Hechos
shortDescription: Este video no muestra los miembros del Parlamento de Dinamarca se ríen del plan de Donald Trump de que Groenlandia pase a ser de Estados Unidos.

title: Nancy Pelosi won't attend Donald Trump's second inauguration
shortDescription: She is one of several Democrats who won't be attending the ceremony.

title: Giuliani settles with Georgia election workers over defamation payout
shortDescription: Rudy Giuliani has reached a settlement with two Georgia election workers he falsely accused of helping steal the 2020 election for Joe Biden.

title: Mike Pence's conservative group urges senate to reject RFK Jr. nom
shortDescription: A conservative group founded by former Vice President Mike Pence is opposing Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s nomination due to his past support for abortion.

title: No, Thune hasn’t blocked Schiff from Senate committees | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no evidence Senate Majority Leader John Thune blocked Sen. Adam Schiff from committee assignments. A spokesperson said the claim is false.

title: TikTok CEO gets prime seat at Trump inauguration as company faces ban
shortDescription: TikTok CEO Shou Zi Chew has been offered a prime seat at the inauguration with other VIP guests.

title: DeSantis announces Rubio replacement in US Senate
shortDescription: DeSantis made the announcement in a Thursday news conference in Orlando.

title: Michelle Obama will not attend Donald Trump's inauguration
shortDescription: Michelle Obama will not attend President-elect Donald Trump’s inauguration, marking the second recent event involving former US leaders that she has skipped.

title: Trump train rolls on: Senate hearings put new team closer to power
shortDescription: Trump's picks to lead four federal agencies testified without the flashes of anger that marked Pete Hegseth and Pam Bondi's earlier showdowns.

title: How to watch Lee Zeldin's Senate confirmation hearing
shortDescription: Former New York Congressman Lee Zeldin is facing his confirmation hearing in the Senate on Thursday. Here's what you need to know.

title: Daily Briefing: Biden says goodbye
shortDescription: Serving as leader 'highest honor of my life' and more news to start your Thursday.

title: Constitution specifies exact moment Trump becomes president
shortDescription: The U.S. Constitution specifies not only the date of presidential inaugurations, but the exact time the transition of power is official.

title: Why Trump’s team is raising concerns about government dysfunction
shortDescription: Many of Trump's picks for top jobs in his next administration have not worked at the highest levels of government or in the private sector.

title: Trump's Treasury pick to face big questions at confirmation hearing
shortDescription: Trump Treasury Secretary nominee Scott Bessent faces a Senate panel on Thursday and can expect grilling from a Democratic watchdog of Wall Street.

title: Reports: Trump considers order to rescue TikTok from sale or ban
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump is considering issuing an executive order to try to save TikTok as the deadline nears that could see the platform banned.

title: Biden says goodbye: 5 takeaways from president's farewell address
shortDescription: President Joe Biden bid goodbye to Americans in a farewell address in which he also warned of serious dangers that threaten democracy.

title: Biden's farewell: Was he the aberration, Trump the new norm?
shortDescription: Analysis: President Biden offers a stark warning about an emerging oligarchy. That's a reference to his predecessor-turned-successor, Donald Trump.

title: Joe Biden warns 'an oligarchy is taking shape.' What does that mean?
shortDescription: President Joe Biden warned Americans of an "oligarchy" on the rise just five days before President-elect Donald Trump returns to the office.

title: Biden address gives warnings and optimism
shortDescription: President Joe Biden bid farewell to the nation and his 50 year political career with an address warning against an oligarchy while offering optimism.

title: A look inside Joe Biden's farewell address from the Oval Office
shortDescription: President Joe Biden will give his farewell primetime address to the nation Wednesday as he enters the final days of his administration and as President-elect Donald Trump prepares to return to the White House.
